Package com.fssa.freshnest.validation

Class UserValidator

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.freshnest.validation.UserValidator
public class UserValidator extends Object
This class provides methods to validate user-related data and operations.
Author:
SusikumarPitchaimuth

      public static boolean validateUser(User user) throws InvalidUserException
      Validates user registration details.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object for registration.
      Returns:
      True if the user data is valid, otherwise throws InvalidUserException.
      Throws:
      InvalidUserException - If the user data is invalid.
